actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to permit curtailed pipelines to fulfill the needs of consumers of natural gas.

summary.text: Natural Gas Temporary Purchase Act - Amends the Natural Gas Act to authorize the Federal Power Commission to exempt from regulation sales of natural gas to interstate pipelines where such sales are not otherwise committed to interstate commerce and where the pipeline company is curtailing deliveries of natural gas supplies.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to permit curtailed pipelines to fulfill the needs of consumers of natural gas.
